title: Macbook Air 820-00165-A No Sound after SMC replacement
message:
Good Day

Macbook Air 820-00165-A came for repair. It was badly rusted near SMC so I tried to replace the SMC. But After SMC replacement every thing works fine except sound output. i have tried new speaker and I/O board and SMC reset. I have no idea where to start for this problem. I did visual inspection of U8040 and nearby area looks good. 

Thanks in advance for your support.

title: Macbook Air 820-00165-A No Sound after SMC replacement
message:
I checked voltage at some points, here it is:-

U8040-Pin 6--3.2V
Pin 2,4--1.5V
Pin1,3--1.5V
P1V5SOSW_Audio_EN--3.2V   i think it should be 1.5V f i am not wrong.

title: Macbook Air 820-00165-A No Sound after SMC replacement
message:
"P1V5SOSW_Audio_EN--3.2V   i think it should be 1.5V"
Do not confuse enable signal with power line!

Did you have sound before SMC replacement?
Be sure to use SMC from donor board, same model.
I recommned you to reball original SMC.

title: Macbook Air 820-00165-A No Sound after SMC replacement
message:
Thanks for support and guidance.
  I tried it again with a different SMC from donor similar  board.  And it start working everything. Thanks again.  i think previous SMC was from 820-03437-B.  This is my first SMC replacement. Its boom........Great...

Thanks Louis..

title: Macbook Air 820-00165-A No Sound after SMC replacement
message:
You're welcome!

BTW, my name is Vali.
